Quote: كان أبي ﻻ يترك صوم اﻹثنين والخميس والبيض .
Detail: ”My dad would not leave fasting on Mondays and Thursdays and the white (days).”
Author: From ’Abdullah ibn Ahmad ibn Hanbal who said:

Detail: ”Fasting is the fortress of the worshippers.”
